messages.msg: Welcome to our site! If you are looking for prayer or someone to chat with, reply to this message or email us at prayer@fightlust.com
I just want to be released and cleansed from all sexual sins lust adultery masturbation fornication porn and impure thoughts

We're here to support you in your journey towards healing. I encourage you to pray and renounce these things, as mentioned in our deliverance prayer. You can come before God, confess your sins, and ask for His cleansing and strength. Remember, you are not alone in this. Would you like me to guide you through a specific prayer or provide more resources?

Great! Hereâ€™s a simple prayer you can use to seek cleansing and strength:

"Dear Lord, I come before You, acknowledging my struggles with sexual sins, lust, and impure thoughts. I ask for Your forgiveness and cleansing. Please wash me clean and help me to turn away from these temptations. Fill me with Your Holy Spirit and guide me in living a life that honors You. Thank You for Your grace and love. In Jesus' name, I pray. Amen."

If you need more resources or specific scriptures to meditate on, just let me know!

Absolutely! Here are some scriptures that can provide strength and encouragement as you seek healing:

1. **1 John 1:9** - "If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness."
2. **Psalm 51:10** - "Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me."
3. **Philippians 4:8** - "Finally, brothers, whatever is true, whatever is honorable, whatever is just, whatever is pure, whatever is lovely, whatever is commendable, if there is any excellence, if there is anything worthy of praise, think about these things."
4. **James 4:7** - "Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you."

These verses can help you focus on God's promises and His power to transform your life. If you need more specific resources or prayers, feel free to ask!
